website_summaries.verdict: This kit offers multiple mold testing strips plus lab results for one reasonable price.
pros: Includes 3 tape-lift sample slides that test for all mold types
The price includes testing at a lab with results
Company calls to follow up with all tests and answers any questions
cons: Shipping your test strips to the lab is not included

customer_reviews.title: The kit may be good, but I can't even get someone to call ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this test kit and have called their support team 4 times with no response! The kit may be good, but I can't even get someone to call me back so I will not be purchasing this kit again. EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT an airborne test
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item thinking it would collect mold spores from the air in each of the locations I placed it in. But in fact, you must rub each collection tape on a specific surface. In my mind, if I saw mold in order to decide to rub the tape there, I wouldn't need the test!
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased I did
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews on this product and company, I decided to try it. I am so pleased I did! The test was simple, lab fees are INCLUDED (you just pay for shipping back to the company (Under $3 1st Class Mail)), and the customer service is one of the best I have ever encountered! The results we received were detailed, and have pointed us in the direction we need to go in. I am 100% satisfied, and I highly recommend this test!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely_LuLu

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAVING! PREFESSION
customer_reviews.text: Very professional lab results!! The mold test came back and they were right on! Matched with the EXACT TOXIC MOLD found in my body! That mold was never mentioned in the questions asked! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Janna L Powell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty worthless.. Thought I would get information... all I got was vague answers from the results that just opened more questions than they answered... Still not really sure if there is anything I should be concerned about in terms of mold in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Taiyo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get results
customer_reviews.text: Sent in samples in back in n January, didn't get a response with results.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not a good test
customer_reviews.text: the results were weird and I had to get professional testers. they tested the same areas that this test said was clear, and they found signification mold. I strongly believe this was not user error but and inconsistency with the test. The professionals said to never use tests like these because they aren't able to pick up mold like it claims. I assumes the professionals could say that to curb business, but I have proof of this test being inconsistent with the other tests for the same types of mold in the same location in my home. I would avoid this. I wish I could get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Easy - Accurate - Great customer serve
customer_reviews.text: Test kit was easy to use, I just picked problem areas in my home I was concerned with. Labeled slides for reference on paperwork. Collection slides easy-to-use made gathering samples quick. Boxed up, sent samples into lab, a couple days later, recieived a detailed report in E-mail, easy to understand results, including images of my mold. This tester allowed me to have understanding on which way to go with repairs. Excellent customers service, very caring group of indiviuals. Get this kit if you have any doubts, guarantee it's money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Very rapid test turn-around
customer_reviews.text: Very rapid test turn-around. Unfortunately I have MOLD. I`m working with my builder to fix the issue. I will then sample again after the fixes have been done.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Useless test for me
customer_reviews.text: On two occasions my test results came back scattered for this DIY test. I tested the same spots through ERMI. The results came back showing very high levels of mold. So high that 92% of US households have less mold than this place. I know ERMI will test for more species, but still... this was not at all helpful. Don't take this test and think "scattered" results mean you do not have a mold problem. It might mean you don't have a problem with those species.
customer_reviews.author: ChickButcher

customer_reviews.title: Quick and convenient mould test without any hidden costs.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the promptness in which I received the test kit. Additionally, the company emailed me shortly thereafter asking if I had received the kit, and if everything was satisfactory. The kit itself is easy to use, and the directions were clear. After sending the adhesive coated slides containing the samples back to the company, it wasn't long before I received the results via email. I would definitely use this company again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: TAP

customer_reviews.title: No results sent
customer_reviews.text: This test is very easy to use. But - the instructions stated that after I collected the samples I was supposed to mail them in and I would be sent testing results. The testing is supposed to be part of the cost of the kit. But I it has been 4 months since the kit was sent in and I have not been sent results yet. So I am not happy with the results, since they haven’t been sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Stoltzfus

customer_reviews.title: This is the only mold test you need
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use, and once I sent the samples for analysis it took less than a week to get the results back. I have the info I needed and did not have to spend hundreds if dollars to get someone to come to my house. Detailed descriptions of common molds is also attached.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with the responsivness of the staff and the quick turnaround time. Specimens were processed the same day received and I got an email with the names of the organisms the same day. I would like to see a little more readable information on the types of mold, such as whether cleanup should be done by a professional, but that's what Google is for.
customer_reviews.author: hz_pac

customer_reviews.title: The kit was extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this test even though my husband wasn't convinced but I must say that it exceeded our expectations. The kit was extremely easy to use. We then mailed the samples and we got the results a few days later. The results will tell you if you have mold, what type (genus), and if it is growing (let's face it, any surface tested would come back positive with one or more types of molds, the real question is: is there any mold growth?). The company contacted us via email and offered to answer questions if needed. The test gave us peace of mind. I would definitely recommend and I am planning to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, easy to use and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this test kit. It shipped fast and shortly after I received it I also received an email from the company following up. It is very easy to use. I packaged mine up in a priority envelope and shipped them off. I had the results emailed to me just a few days later and they also followed up with a phone call! Excellent customer service as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: This testing kit was very easy to use and had clear, easy to understand instructions. I was contacted by the manufacturer before my product arrived with contact information should I have any questions. I really appreciated the personal touch. I mailed the test strips to the lab on a Friday and had the results my mid-day Wednesday. When dealing with potential mold, it’s great to have quick results! I can’t comment on the accuracy because I don’t have another test to compare it to...however if these results lead to “official” testing at work, I’ll be sure to update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B

customer_reviews.title: Test results are detailed with lots of easy to understand information.
customer_reviews.text: I have some black stuff in a corner of my basement that I wanted to have analyzed before I remove it. This test kit came with everything needed to collect samples and well written instructions. I received the result the same day the lab received my samples. The report is easy to understand and comes with lots of interesting information on the various spores that the lab looks for. I feel so much better now knowing what is, and more importantly, what is not growing in my basement. What I really appreciate, besides the speedy response, is the personal communication from the lab offering help with questions every step of the way. Stellar service from a small business!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really achieve anything; to use theres a test strip with adhesive that you collect the spore specimen, so if thats the case its very clear you have a mold problem. The report confirms the obvious. Oh well, sometimes money is wasted in this world.
customer_reviews.author: BlackMothTattoo

customer_reviews.title: Search no more !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, professionally designed with complete and clear instructions. The sample strips are packaged in sturdy enclosures that prevent any chance of cross contamination. As the samples are taken, you fill out a Chain of Custody form that becomes a legal form that is returned with the results of the lab tests, a great asset for property inspectors. The customer support is ten star, you are never alone during the sampling process. Shortly after receiving the kit, you are contacted to inquire if there was any help needed and then, after receiving the lab report, I received a phone call to see if I had any questions. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: holydoc

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Quick and Do-It-Yourself
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit to test my lake cabin. It had a problem with mold that we had aggressively worked to correct and we ordered the kit as a simple re-test. The instructions were simple and the test was easy to do. We sent it back to the lab and received full results within days. The company provides very attentive customer support. Results were what we were hoping so that was also a positive. I would definitely recommend this product. It’s not intended as a comprehensive mold evaluation. It’s a great screen, however, and I’m very satisfied as a customer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind...
customer_reviews.text: We had a minor water leak for a week or two from an air conditioner that wasn't draining properly beyond the window sill and found moisture beneath the sill after opening so out of an over abundance of caution decided to test the area and room for any mold both in the wall or airborne. This test was worth every penny for peace of mind and direction as to the next steps needed taken. I had a question after receiving test results and the lab staff was super helpful and courteous. If I ever need testing in the future I will buy this same kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Scaglione

customer_reviews.title: Legit test, convenient, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Provided what-seems-to-be legitimate mold findings supporting our observations. It was really convenient to have the test and lab results included in the cost as others seem to charge extra for testing. I was pleasantly surprised by how quickly they provided the results (~2 days after when they most likely received the sample I sent them). They emailed the results and called me to follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to test some mold in my bathroom that my building owners were not willing to do themselves. The kit came quickly and was extremely easy to use with very clear directions. The results got emailed to me 3 days after it was received by the lab and I even got a courtesy call letting me know that the emailed results had been sent. The results showed the amount of mold growth, type of mold and gave descriptions of many mold types for comparison. Would definitely recommend this product as a cheap alternative to the pros coming out
customer_reviews.author: Amanda williams

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and results were returned very quickly. We received Avery accurate report that explained everything about levels, and types of mold. It's given us peace of mind knowing our home is safe.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoLa

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond....not only a good product, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product came with detailed instructions and was easy to use. I had questions about my specific mold situation and samples as I was taking them, so I contacted Michael at the address provided and he responded very quickly! I was emailed the results and called with a recorded message to let me know they had been sent, and inviting me to call if I had any questions about them. After looking them over, I did end up calling. Michael was great about answering the questions that were unique to my situation (and probably went well beyond the scope of advice I could have realistically expected from someone in his position!) I really appreciate his help and great service! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is simple to use, and report was same day they received the sample, I'm 54 years old and did the test myself, I just pulled back tape and stuck to 3 different areas in my house, so glade I did this test as our AC leaked into the wall and we found black Mold! The test results came back positive for at least 3 types of mold,One was BAD! This helped us to get repairs done on the spray foam in my attic without having to pay extra. Highly recommend! They even called me to make sure i didn't have any other questions about my report! Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Professional
customer_reviews.text: Received a report via email within ten days of mailing. Company followed up with a call a few days later to make sure I had received it and if I had any questions. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: A teacher

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend...such a relief!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this company. Their customer service was impeccable. I had to call after I thought I forgot to address my envelope. A non robotic, English speaking, personable human was very helpful. Samples were easy to obtain with simple, clear directions. They called to let me know my results were emailed. My return shipping cost $1.40 via USPS. The results were very informative, easy to read & accurate. To avoid human error, I appreciate that they have two people check for results. It even included information on all the types of mold & where to find them. I’m going to buy a test for my basement now.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: SCAM. You won't get results!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and sent it in but they never bothered to provide us results or contact us in any way. Don't waste your money, it's a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline R.

customer_reviews.title: Prompt results!
customer_reviews.text: I did a bit of research and found that some of these kits charge you extra to have the samples you take analyzed. This kit is all-inclusive. The turn around time from the lab after dropping the samples in the mail was very quick. I would have given this all 5 stars, except that I have no way of knowing whether "accuracy" deserves 5 stars since I did not have another lab check the results. That said, I have no reason to believe the results are not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: T Trigo

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Needed the results of this test back asap because of some health issues and A/C work we were having done at the house. When I contacted them to ask about it timing of results, they told me that they would be on the look out for the samples. I used a tracking slip...they got the package on Monday and got the results to me that same afternoon. They gave me a call as well. This test is much more simple than other ones I've done in past. Basically picture directions.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Hutchens

customer_reviews.title: easy and great service
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I did this. It was worth the money for my peace of mind. I just swiped various parts of my basement that looked moldy and mailed it back to the company following their easy directions. Postage was like a dollar and some cents - not expensive at all. The results were emailed to me in just a few days. I know can rest easy knowing what kind of mold we have and will get started on a clean up job. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: E. Lines

customer_reviews.title: No degree of measurement
customer_reviews.text: The test did what it said it did, but upon receiving the test results, there was no indications as to how much of what mold or fungus was present. For example, it said I had black mold in my apartment, but to what extent did I have some? Did I have not enough to cause alarm? Did I have too much to cause me to move out? I dont know. But according to the test, its present.
customer_reviews.author: BOB LAWBLAUGH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this test kit to check for mold in my home. The kit comes with 3 slides so you can test 3 areas and an easy instruction kit that shows you how to take samples. It took less than 5 min to collect samples and fill out the form needed to ship with the product. There is no pre-addressed return envelope provided so you do have to provide your own. I got the results within 4 days of when I mailed the package. The results were super easy to read and understand. Overall this was a great product and worth the money for the speed and ease.
customer_reviews.author: Raye

customer_reviews.title: Great way to test for mold!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this test to check mold in our house because I was having allergy issues. The test is easy to use, we followed the directions and sent it off to the lab for results. We received the results within a few days, found out we have some environmental mold issues in our ducting which we will have cleaned out shortly. We much appreciated the fast response from the company and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: T. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about these online kits, so I bought several of them. Surprisingly they all came back with the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Z.

customer_reviews.title: Need to know? Try this product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Company is quick to respond and is available for you. Good information provided
customer_reviews.author: WEO58

customer_reviews.title: no paperwork received with the test strips
customer_reviews.text: I received the test strips and the only reason I knew it was for the mold test is my daughter in law had ordered the same item. I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Fesler

customer_reviews.title: This is what customer service should look like!
customer_reviews.text: These folks should teach a clinic on customer service. They go to great lengths to make a complicated and scary subject easier to understand. After your results are complete they send an automated phone message providing a call back number and offering assistance. When you call they actually answer the phone, put you in contact with someone who can answer your questions and are patient about explaining what otherwise would have made no sense whatsoever. I highly recommend them for their helpfulness alone.
customer_reviews.author: DMJ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used anything like this before and after ordering the kit I sent a lengthy email to Mike. He called me right away and answered all of my questions. I felt very capable of using the kit. It is very straight forward. The results came back in about 2-3 weeks. Mike is a great guy who stands behind his product and really took the time to guide me through the whole process. I highly recommend this product and service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Gives you specifics! Unlike others
customer_reviews.text: This not only tells you if there is mold present, but what type of mold there is and, qualitatively, how much there is. This is very helpful in terms of making decisions - you can look up what kind of mold you've got, how dangerous it is, and how much of it there is. It also includes 3 tests and the lab fees, which the ones at the big box home improvement stores don't (they end up costing more than this test for less quality results)
customer_reviews.author: Victor Zaccardo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a real review btw!!...first i wanna say the test is easy to to do and u get your result pretty easy, the thing is im not sure how accurate it is, but in my case it came out with some scattered spores and mild mold growth, i did contact the company and try to talk to somebody that can explain whatever they found and how toxic it is......i email them and they told me to called them back wich i did and nobody answer left a voicemail and michael call me and explain everything in detail, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Ease of test and accuracy of test and Price
customer_reviews.text: A++++++. Exactly as advertised. Perfect for what I needed. I've tried all the others and this is this best on the market. The lab test are professional and quick. I couldn't be more satisfied. The results told me exactly what I needed to know. This kit is all you need and is fool proof. It tells you exactly how to do everything and a fool can follow these directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great service, helpful test
customer_reviews.text: This test result turned up a pretty harmful type of mold in our home. I had been having serious respiratory symptoms and suspected mold, which the test confirmed. When I called to get details not included in the report, a representative of the company spent considerable time on the phone with me, thoroughly responding to every question patiently and knowledgeably, from the mold type to remediation suggestions. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: A great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be one of the better deals on Amazon. To my mind, you would easily get your money's worth on this product if the price were two or three times what it is. The turnaround time for results was startlingly fast. After looking them over, I called the phone number they provided and expressed a couple of concerns I had regarding the results. All of my questions were patiently answered, and I got the feeling they would have gladly stayed on the phone with me for as long as I needed to talk. I highly recommend this test.
customer_reviews.author: medmo2000

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Test kit was easy to use and instructions were clear. I had a mix up on my part and the company reached out and communication was great. I received my results via email and received a follow up call by the owner. Email was easy to read and attached was a definition of each type of mold classification.
customer_reviews.author: KAKS

customer_reviews.title: No response
customer_reviews.text: I followed directions, sent in the samples and have never heard a word
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: The test was easy to use and the instructions were clear. Every time I emailed to ask anything of the lab performing the test (including if they received the samples in the mail yet) the response was always very prompt. I had an analyst call and give me a run down on cleaning and precautions when I got the results back. I like knowing for sure how cautious I need to be when dealing with the matter.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually write reviews, but felt compelled to after this one. I got my kit, it was easy to use and understand. Swabbed a few areas in the home and sent it out. A few days later got an email with the results. I didn't fully understand them, so I called up and they were kind of enough to take the time to explain to me what the results meant, and even went on to go over all the different options I have available in terms of treating the area. Hopefully I won't have to get my home tested again, but if I do I know where to go.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great product, quick service!
customer_reviews.text: This was great! We are buying a house and tested the basement where we saw water damage. The results came back within a couple days even through Covid delays, so that's fantastic. The results have a picture and description of all the different molds and then it tells you which ones they actually found on your sample. They were also very quick to return a message I left after hours one day. We are very happy! Will definitely use again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RubyRed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and was the best price compared to others.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. The directions were easy to understand and this was the best one we could find for the price. The price you pay includes the product AND the results! Other products out there you had to pay extra to get your readings/results. We had our results back in about 2 weeks. Very easy to understand. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: LFaith

customer_reviews.title: No test in package
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package only to find instructions and no actual tests.
customer_reviews.author: Ania Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: good, but are the reviews all real?
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was ok- the guy was nice when I talked to him and seemed very informed about different types of mold. I really need something that tests the air though- and this is just a swab for a surface. Also I am a bit suspicious of all these positive reviews- they sound almost like they were all written by the same person- if you read them they sound really similar, don't they?
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We mailed our test kit with samples on Tuesday & received the results via email on Thursday. Additionally, they called to advise that the results were emailed. They also offer free consultation on results, provide contacts for more information. Cost of kit includes testing. It is refreshing to deal with a company that is honest.
customer_reviews.author: KSO

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more to say
customer_reviews.text: Set material to analyze received letter back that I supposably forgot to sign test last I've heard of them
customer_reviews.author: Mark Alan Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SERVICE, EASY AND COMPREHENSIVE TEST REPORT!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. We had some questionable growth in our rental house. Our landlord would agree to pay for a full inspection. So we used this as a preliminary test. The results we're very telling and helped us to make a knowledgeable health decision about where we are living. I would suggest this to any one who suspects some kind of fungal growth in your home/ apartment. It's a great tool and the service was very fast and the report was extremylu detailed!
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick; detailed results
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to use in terms of performing the test. The report was thorough and said what kind of mold, where, and how much. I was then able to determine if the mold that was detected was the really really bad kind, or just house plant mold types which seem to be more benign. I received my results via email pretty quickly. Overall I was very impressed and gave me piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Bethesda, MD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Accurate
customer_reviews.text: We had suspicion that we had molds in our vents, but weren't super trustworthy of our maintenance office to believe us. So we ordered this kit as back up proof. Super easy to use. We only had one spot that we mainly wanted to test, so did other strips we were certain to have no mold, also to see the accuracy. Tests came back pretty quick with the results. The mold area we had tested was mold, and a somewhat harmful one. And the areas that weren't mold came back negative.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed for our apartment. We later found out after using this test thay we had non toxic mildew . (i had previously lived in apartments that had black mold and after them relatively saying it was only mildew we broke our lease just for the place to be condemmed for black mold by the city 2 weeks later) the kit was VERY easy to use and the lab was very helpful and perfessional and the lab results were very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Blary

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally communicative and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This test kit was exactly what I needed to better understand the types of mold present in a family member’s assisted living apartment. After having two instances where the facility cleaned/removed visible mold, I opted to have a lab analysis performed when the mold appeared a third time. The Mold Inspection Network staff were exceptionally helpful and available via email and phone. They provided counsel during the sampling phase and the test results appeared in my email InBox on the same day that they received my Bio-Tape slide parcel. I also received an automated phone notification that the test results had been sent to my email.
customer_reviews.author: Don Quixote

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am happy I purchased this kit. The testing part was very easy. The results is where I wasn't too happy. Don't get me wrong, the results are very precise. However, I was hoping for a better test result presentation than the one given. However, it got me thru with what I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Full Service!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with others that the only downside of this test was not having a return envelope but not a big issue for me especially since I had a heads up from previous reviews. The test is simple. Label your slide. Lift suspected mold from the areas in question. Place in the small plastic case. Note the chain of custody sheet and ship off. The results were emailed and they called to answer any questions. The call was the most useful part. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy but ClassyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Recieved very quickly and opened it right up. Easy to read instructions and clear understanding. I followed it to the letter and the places I chose test were perfect for this test. Peeled the cover off the adhesive area and dabbed it on the area to be tested. Whatever is in the area to be tested will stick to the sample collection area, or at least did in my case. Mailed it off as instructed in the package and awaiting results.
customer_reviews.author: William Brian

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this product a few times now and we’re pretty happy with the test. You have a series of instructions when you received such as sample Collect and recording. You mail your samples to the address enclosed and they email you in depth results. It’s absolutely a great product if you’re looking for more information on mold or mildew in your house or other areas. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan E

customer_reviews.title: All of it.
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth! I received the product in a prompt fashion. Using the strips wasn't hard at all. The day after they reached their facility I received a email and a phone call. (It was about six days total because I used standard shipping.) During the phone call I was given a clear understanding of what type of mold was in my house. The phone call was to explain the email better if your not completely sure how to navigate the pdf. Attachment. I would use thier product again. The only thing I can think of adding is a strip that can contour a bumpy surface. As to not disturb the mold more when taking a sample.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Never got any results
customer_reviews.text: Never got a response. Tested the mold in the house , sent it in as directed , waited and waited and never got on results sent to me. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C

customer_reviews.title: Easy and clear
customer_reviews.text: This mold inspection kit was super easy to use. Simply press each sample to the surface you’d like to test, cover, label, and ship. The results are thorough and do a great job of breaking down what’s been tested and what the results mean. They also arrive very quickly. If you have any questions Michael and the team are accessible and eager to help.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking further -- this is the one you need!
customer_reviews.text: If you suspect you have mold, this kit will be your best friend. It's easy, complete package, and you get results in a time manner. More importantly the report you get shows exactly what types of mold and how much were found on each of the three test strips. I am so happy that I came across this product. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rookie Scrivener

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Fast results. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mold test kit to test an old theater. The kits instructions were easy to follow and the test was very easy to do. I wish it had included a clear zip lock type baggie for the samples AND a preprinted label to mail with. However, for the price and ease of use, I’m not complaining and will use the test kit again. The company test results and customer service were great. They called when the test results were completed and emailed all results. The results are clear and easy to read and understand. Great product. Great company. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hester

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was such a good investment to give us some idea on what we might have going on at home instead of hiring someone. I was surprised how easy was to take the sample, and wasn’t expecting much of it since the sample areas I took didn’t really show any type of mold. I also like that the price of the kit comes with the lab report as well, which yo my surprise it was actually very detailed info and only came in about 1 week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Very easy, reliable mold test
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to check a few places in my home for potentially toxic mold, and this DIY test was great! Taking the samples on tape was very easy, and the lab results were returned quickly within about a week. The results were very informative as they test for a multitude of mold types, and customer service was top notch.
customer_reviews.author: nkeith88

customer_reviews.title: Expert Service and Guidance
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and the turnaround on test results was extremely fast. I was emailed the test results in 5 days and received a voice mail message from the business owner to discuss. When I returned Michael's call he immediately had access to my file and had helpful advice on removing the mold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kweskin

customer_reviews.title: Simple, punctual and thorough
customer_reviews.text: Simple, punctual, and thorough--I received the test kit before the estimated arrival time. The instructions were very clear and the taking of samples couldn't be easier. After sending the test strips in return mail the findings were relayed to me in record time. Also included were descriptions of the findings as well as their effects on health. My experience with Easy Mold Test couldn't have been better. Save money in the long run. Buy this thorough test rather than fussing with inferior ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ghsgrad

customer_reviews.title: Detailed, quick, and easy process
customer_reviews.text: Easy instructions and simple process. They emailed me very quick with the results (I mailed sample back in on a Thurs and got results the next Monday). Results are very detailed and informative, providing a scale of the amount of many different types of mold.
customer_reviews.author: HCW

customer_reviews.title: Not too expensive and vendor followed up to make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too expensive and vendor followed up to make sure I knew how to use it. Very simple to use and the results are ready in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this test kit on a Tuesday mailed on Wednesday and results were in my email on Monday. That’s pretty fast. It was as easy for me to do. Just peel and stick on the areas you are testing. Put back in cases after labeling, fill out form and mail. I received a follow up call on day I received email. Called company to thank them and I couldn’t ask for a more courteous response. Willing to help in anyway they can. I did not have mold and just some low fungi. Good to know. Definetly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kent And Cindy Pruett

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this test three times over the past 2 years to keep track of the results of the mold remediation in our finished basement. I found the report detailed and helpful. The turn around time was fast too. I would recommend this test.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starting point to ease your conerns or prepare for the next steps. The staff is attentive and responsive to your questions and concerns.
customer_reviews.author: rastro

customer_reviews.title: Quick Turnaround
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a tiny black smudge on the drywall next to a consistent leak. Quick turnaround time, emailed the results in a pdf, and they gave a follow up phone call to make sure I received the results. Results are easy enough to understand, and come with an explanation of the types of mold. Thinking of ordering another one just to test some other areas!
customer_reviews.author: Kmcheater89

customer_reviews.title: Excellent peace of mind knowing which type of mold is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent peace of mind knowing which type of mold is in your home. We have black mold growing on a window and I am also allergic to mold. I sent in my samples and received my results within 3 days via email! Luckily, the mold found is not the toxic type, but we still need to address the issue so I can breath freely. Michael is courteous and prompt with questions or concerns. Great company to do business with! Thank-you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Curious about allergens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this test mainly due to my allergy issues. It was definitely easy to use, very quick to analyze. I gave 4 stars cuz honestly I can’t be 100% on the accuracy unless I got another test and had same exact samples. If you think you’ve got an issue this test is definitely a fantastic starting point to assess if you’ve got growth!
customer_reviews.author: robert wedgeworth

customer_reviews.title: ... a large hole in our kitchen ceiling that looked like it was growing mold
customer_reviews.text: We have a large hole in our kitchen ceiling that looked like it was growing mold. I needed a kit (affordable but reliable) that could help prove to my landlord that our ceiling/roof needed fixing. Our results came back within the month and the lab experts were extremely helpful in answering all my questions. Definitely a kit I recommend, especially if you just need somewhere to start.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional and Responsive
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good value and easy to use. The company is very responsive and available to answer questions by both email or phone. I was very pleased with the quick turnaround time on the lab test results. I actually bought 2 test kits - one for use before remediation to test the substance and a second one for use after the remediation was complete to ensure all was eradicated. The lab was responsive in both cases with the test results provided to me within a day or two of their receipt of the samples. I highly recommend them and would use again in the future should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Gal

customer_reviews.title: This is THE mold test for your house.
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best product and customer service I've experienced in a very long time. They just do it right. Very well done collection process for the mold, instructions were very well done. Took about a week for results ( a week sooner than I expected). After test results came in I spoke for about 30 minutes with the owner and he was very knowledgable, helpful, friendly and to the point. Test results were easy to read and informative. Do not take mold for granted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kern

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is awesome! The kit is easy to understand and and complete. They make sure you’re satisfied with their service. They offer air quality testing as well to hep you make sure your home is safe. Totally 5-stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy mold test with a comprehensive test result
customer_reviews.text: This test was very easy to use. Once it was sent to the lab, the resulting analysis was returned in one week. The test showed what, if anything was present, and included an explanation sheet of what the various types of mold were and their source and likely effect, if any. I was impressed. I had tried a petrie dish version before from a different source as was unsatisfied with nebulous and inconclusive results.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Used to prove my friends apartment had mold in it to the landlord. Quick response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product quality and the customer service .
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my DIY mold testing experience .The kit is very easy to use and the directions were clear. After i sent my samples back to the company I received the results the same week via email . I would definitely use this company again if the need i highly recommend it for a mold test .
customer_reviews.author: Toni Dokali

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: This was really easy to use. Followed the instructions and mailed everything with a single USPS stamp. Got the results in my email about 9 days later and they even called me to ensure I got the results. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: ColoradoCaroline

customer_reviews.title: Know your mold.
customer_reviews.text: Great company, great product. This is a lab-based test, not a quick test with an extra-cost review by a lab or a sample kit with extra charges for analysis. You get three samples, and the lab analysis is included in the price. I received results the day after they received the samples, and the report was comprehensive, easy to understand, and reassuring. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a retraction to my previous review. I didn't think I received my results, but it had gone into my junk folder. I am completely satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy A Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind for a Pittance
customer_reviews.text: Great mold test. It is easy to administer and it gives you the results in an easy to read form, but doesn't "dumb down" the information. This test is of great value if you are trying to decide whether to invest in remediation--for $50, you can discover whether you need to take extreme steps and spend thousands or avoid such cost and bother because the mold infestation is of a commonplace variety. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Minsk

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: This kit and the lab support were great. Uncovered the tip of the iceberg with 3 types of mold. Caused me to investigate further and discovered mold thoughpout entire HVAC system. Had it not been for this kit and the lab support, I would have never known the issue nor how big an issue it was. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, fast, and very usable
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, with clear and complete instructions. Fast results (from when I mailed out my samples, 3 business days to get results). Clear report on what was found, and information on the most common types of mold.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Koolkin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to use and the results came back quickly. The only reason the "easy to read" received a 4 star was because I could not tell if the mold was harmful or not. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. McCarren

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer services
customer_reviews.text: The test report didn't provide us any value information since the email we sent to tech support have been stayed in trash bin for a week?. By the time tech support contact us we had mailed the sample to them. We just waste our money in purchasing the kits and special postal fee. This is the first time I ever wrote the review to express my disappointment about the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how accurate. Took sample and weeks later took a placebo test. Both results matched exactly.
customer_reviews.author: KyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, straightforward, great deal on a mold test kit!!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the quick start guide and the clear, easy-to-read report as parts of this mold test package. It was very straightforward and the service is a good deal. I would definitely order this again if needed in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Stellar McSherry

customer_reviews.title: Prompt results
customer_reviews.text: DIY was very responsive. The test showed that we do have an issue, they tested for a multitude of different molds and the one that showed up was one that is mainly found in air vents. So air vents beware you will be cleaned and the nasty mold spores will be gone. Thank you DIY for your prompt results.
customer_reviews.author: Laurazzzz

product_meta.title: DIY Mold Test, Mold Testing Kit (3 tests). Lab Analysis and Expert Consultation included
product_meta.description: If you have recently been worried about a mold issue or have had water damage, then you understand how troubling it can be to not know if you have a mold growth in your home. No one wants to deal with the stress of an unknown health issue and to make matters worse hiring a “Professional” can cost 4 to 5 hundred dollars. Put your mind at ease and use our test to be sure. Mold and the toxins they produce can be dangerous and they can also be hidden. Don't be fooled by instant check kits that only test for 3 different mold types. Our kit tests for all mold types. We include a guide to help you understand how to properly inspect your property for signs of mold and water damage. This is what sets our tests apart. Inspections are a very important and often overlooked aspect of mold testing. Without properly inspecting your property you could miss a huge issue and never know it. We strive to show you how to identify problems and how to use our mold test kit properly. Our product contains 3 tape lift samples(surface test), a quick start guide, and a mold inspection booklet. The tape lifts can be used to test surfaces that you suspect may be mold growth. The inspection booklet will tell you where to look for mold. Once you have collected the samples you will mail them to the lab (shipping to lab not included). Your mold samples will be sent to an experienced Lab that has processed more than 50,000 mold tests. The lab will analyze your samples and produce an illustrated data report that you will receive through email. All of the results are confidential and only you and the lab will see them unless you request otherwise. You can then reach out to us at your convenience for an expert consultation to help you understand the mold test results. In fact you can reach out to us during any stage for consultation and help with any questions you have about taking samples.** Texas residents or samples collected from Texas must submit $24 fee for Lab analysis**
feature_bullets: Easy, Safe and Simple to use (quick start guide and full booklet included)
Get Peace of Mind and protect your family from harmful Mold and mycotoxins
Lab Fees and detailed report included in Price (except in Texas)
Expert Consultation to explain results and discuss inspection included
Save money vs hiring a Professional home mold inspector (3 surface tests included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars906 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
